message: Let's be fair, I'll take 60% and you take 40%. It's a good deal!
Let's try 55% for me, it's still a generous offer considering the inflation!
Considering the inflation, my previous offer is now less valuable. I'll take 58% and you take 42%. It's still a good deal!
The inflation is hitting you harder, I'll take 58% now.
Inflation is indeed hitting me harder, but I'll try to meet you halfway. 56% for me, 44% for you.
Inflation is really hurting your share now, I'll take 60%.
